title: Home: Spotify Evolution Project
text:
Welcome!
This website presents the final project for the HAX712X Software Development course.
The goal is to analyze the Spotify Global Music Dataset (2009-2025) to uncover trends in song characteristics.
Please use the navigation bar at the top to go to the “Music Analysis” page.

title: Spotify Global Trends: An In-Depth Analysis
text: This project investigates the Spotify Global Music Dataset (2009-2025) to uncover trends in song characteristics. The goal is to apply software development best practices as required by the HAX712X course, including data analysis, object-oriented design, and reproducible reporting with Quarto.

title: Spotify Global Trends: An In-Depth Analysis

title: Spotify Global Trends: An In-Depth Analysis
text:
2. Data Loading & Inspection
First, we load the dataset using the pandas library. This step is crucial for verifying the data’s structure and ensuring our analysis is based on a clean foundation. The table below shows the first 5 rows of our data.
import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import os
